summary: A configurable ResNet‑based front‑end that ingests video frames (grayscale or RGB) and produces per‑frame visual feature vectors for lip‑reading systems. It supports multiple ResNet depths, applies spatial average pooling, projects to a desired dimensionality, and can output tensors in either channels‑first or channels‑last layout.
business_intent: Supply high‑quality visual speech representations to downstream audio‑visual or visual‑only speech recognition pipelines, improving robustness and accuracy of lip‑reading applications.
